title: Mass Distributions Beyond TDHF
abstract: The mass distributions for giant dipole resonances in S-32 and Sn-132 decaying through particle emission and for deep-inelastic collisions between O-16 nuclei have been investigated by implementing the Balian-Vénéroni variational technique based upon a three-dimensional time-dependent Hartree-Fock code with realistic Skyrme interactions. The mass distributions obtained have been sown to be significantly larger than standard TDHF results.
rawRecordXml:
oai:epubs.surrey.ac.uk:229 2017-10-31T13:57:14Z 7374617475733D707562 74797065733D636F6E666572656E63655F6974656D 6469766973696F6E733D656E67616E64706879736963616C736369656E636573:70687973696373
http://epubs.surrey.ac.uk/229/ Mass Distributions Beyond TDHF Stevenson, P. D Broomfield, J. M. A

The mass distributions for giant dipole resonances in S-32 and Sn-132 decaying through particle emission and for deep-inelastic collisions between O-16 nuclei have been investigated by implementing the Balian-Vénéroni variational technique based upon a three-dimensional time-dependent Hartree-Fock code with realistic Skyrme interactions. The mass distributions obtained have been sown to be significantly larger than standard TDHF results.
